titleStmt.title: John Scott et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2829

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p: To his Excellency Honorable Beriah Magoffin Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, whereas there is a vacancy in the office of Justice of the Peace in the 5th ^fifth^ Justice's district in Metcalfe County caused By the Resignation of B. F. Hiser Esqr.
we the undersigned would therefore petition your Excellency to appoint Thos. G. Sheffitt to fill said Vacancy untill the next Election Believing him to Be a suitable Man to fill said office.
Believing he would ^give^ general satisfaction to all conserned.

John Scott
J. B. Cassady
Waddy Thompson
Smith Read
John Kock
H R Davis
David Faulkner
J A Fag
J B Porter
C J Porter
Wm B Morris
S C Morris
John Jewel, sen
B Bass
J Pegle
Wm H Porter

R Robertson

jesse Burton

M.. D. Higgason

Metcalfe Co
J. P.
Dist No 5
App June 9. 1862
